column1: Local Foods////I love the falfel sandwich
column2: and dare I say it's better than some falfel's that I get from Middle Eastern places. It's on toasted wheat bread topped with pickled shallots(I think
column6: and a yogurt sauce. Heaven. It comes with two sides or a cup of soup. I like the kale salad and beets. I've also tried the orzo
column8: but I do like the cabbage slaw which has an asian flare to it as it has peanut sauce. I've also tried out the chicken soup which is coconut based and it has lemon grass in it which makes it refreshing
